:::success Temporal CLI is now available!

The new [Temporal CLI](/cli) is available for use.

tctl v1.17 can still be used with Temporal Server version 1.20 and is expected to be compatible with Temporal Server version 1.21.

tctl is expected to be fully deprecated by Temporal Server version 1.22

:::

The `tctl activity` commands enable [Activity Execution](/activities#activity-execution) <span id="i-0ca50a66-6bc5-4eaf-9355-d6fe7ef20ee7" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-0ca50a66-6bc5-4eaf-9355-d6fe7ef20ee7" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-0ca50a66-6bc5-4eaf-9355-d6fe7ef20ee7" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is an Activity Execution?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">An Activity Execution is the full chain of Activity Task Executions.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> operations.

- [tctl activity complete](#complete) <span id="i-e26ab0e3-fa55-439d-8cd1-a3091843e9e7" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-e26ab0e3-fa55-439d-8cd1-a3091843e9e7" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-e26ab0e3-fa55-439d-8cd1-a3091843e9e7" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">tctl activity complete</div><div class="preview-modal-description">How to provide a result and complete an Activity Execution using tctl.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">tctl</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span></div></div>
- [tctl activity fail](#fail) <span id="i-21c371dd-320a-4311-b99c-a028df27a3de" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-21c371dd-320a-4311-b99c-a028df27a3de" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-21c371dd-320a-4311-b99c-a028df27a3de" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">tctl activity fail</div><div class="preview-modal-description">How to fail an Activity Execution using tctl.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">tctl</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span></div></div>

## complete

The `tctl activity complete` command completes an [Activity Execution](/activities#activity-execution) <span id="i-50ea5bd6-fec0-4c00-b088-226db6d7addf" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-50ea5bd6-fec0-4c00-b088-226db6d7addf" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-50ea5bd6-fec0-4c00-b088-226db6d7addf" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is an Activity Execution?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">An Activity Execution is the full chain of Activity Task Executions.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div>.

`tctl activity complete <modifiers>`

The following modifiers control the behavior of the command.

### --workflow_id

Specify the [Workflow Id](/workflows#workflow-id) <span id="i-ad2ac856-fe38-44ee-8e11-16716f077bc1" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-ad2ac856-fe38-44ee-8e11-16716f077bc1" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-ad2ac856-fe38-44ee-8e11-16716f077bc1" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Id?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Id is a customizable, application-level identifier for a Workflow Execution that is unique to an Open Workflow Execution within a Namespace.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> of an [Activity Execution](/activities#activity-execution) <span id="i-8f17b7d4-f64f-4456-8056-ce17dd59701b" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-8f17b7d4-f64f-4456-8056-ce17dd59701b" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-8f17b7d4-f64f-4456-8056-ce17dd59701b" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is an Activity Execution?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">An Activity Execution is the full chain of Activity Task Executions.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> to complete.

Alias: `-w`

**Example**

```bash
tctl activity complete --workflow_id <id>
```

### --run_id

Specify the [Run Id](/workflows#run-id) <span id="i-1286aea8-c42a-4203-a2a1-9a1371e45126" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-1286aea8-c42a-4203-a2a1-9a1371e45126" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-1286aea8-c42a-4203-a2a1-9a1371e45126" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Run Id?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Run Id is a globally unique, platform-level identifier for a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> of an [Activity Execution](/activities#activity-execution) <span id="i-139bbb3a-6687-4f2a-99d9-42d89ae9db33" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-139bbb3a-6687-4f2a-99d9-42d89ae9db33" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-139bbb3a-6687-4f2a-99d9-42d89ae9db33" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is an Activity Execution?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">An Activity Execution is the full chain of Activity Task Executions.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> to complete.

Alias: `-r`

**Example**

```bash
tctl activity complete --run_id <id>
```

### --activity_id

Specify the [Activity Id](/activities#activity-id) <span id="i-4ee7ffd0-2588-49c9-ac01-3716ffda73bb" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-4ee7ffd0-2588-49c9-ac01-3716ffda73bb" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-4ee7ffd0-2588-49c9-ac01-3716ffda73bb" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is an Activity Id?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A unique identifier for an Activity Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> of an [Activity Execution](/activities#activity-execution) <span id="i-533867de-ea67-4c25-89a5-1b486ea26854" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-533867de-ea67-4c25-89a5-1b486ea26854" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-533867de-ea67-4c25-89a5-1b486ea26854" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is an Activity Execution?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">An Activity Execution is the full chain of Activity Task Executions.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> to complete.

**Example**

```bash
tctl activity complete --activity_id <id>
```

### --result

Specify the result of an [Activity Execution](/activities#activity-execution) <span id="i-2b43c0fd-c4d4-4106-8e52-261308ed1bec" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-2b43c0fd-c4d4-4106-8e52-261308ed1bec" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-2b43c0fd-c4d4-4106-8e52-261308ed1bec" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is an Activity Execution?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">An Activity Execution is the full chain of Activity Task Executions.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> when using tctl to complete the Activity Execution.

**Example**

```bash
tctl activity complete --result <value>
```

### --identity

Specify the identity of the operator when using tctl to complete an [Activity Execution](/activities#activity-execution) <span id="i-1f19cfe3-ce9b-4ce6-a1a7-917170a84c43" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-1f19cfe3-ce9b-4ce6-a1a7-917170a84c43" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-1f19cfe3-ce9b-4ce6-a1a7-917170a84c43" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is an Activity Execution?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">An Activity Execution is the full chain of Activity Task Executions.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div>.

**Example**

```bash
tctl activity complete --identity <value>
```

## fail

The `tctl activity fail` command fails an [Activity Execution](/activities#activity-execution) <span id="i-eb4aad01-dd36-405c-82c5-73d4dfa24a0e" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-eb4aad01-dd36-405c-82c5-73d4dfa24a0e" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-eb4aad01-dd36-405c-82c5-73d4dfa24a0e" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is an Activity Execution?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">An Activity Execution is the full chain of Activity Task Executions.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div>.

`tctl activity fail [<modifiers>]`

The following modifiers control the behavior of the command.

### --workflow_id

Specify the [Workflow Id](/workflows#workflow-id) <span id="i-093c7785-e730-409e-8efa-7cce127f4cc6" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-093c7785-e730-409e-8efa-7cce127f4cc6" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-093c7785-e730-409e-8efa-7cce127f4cc6" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow Id?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Workflow Id is a customizable, application-level identifier for a Workflow Execution that is unique to an Open Workflow Execution within a Namespace.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> of an [Activity Execution](/activities#activity-execution) <span id="i-8d3cd4c7-e07c-446e-ac1b-e730012d206a" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-8d3cd4c7-e07c-446e-ac1b-e730012d206a" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-8d3cd4c7-e07c-446e-ac1b-e730012d206a" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is an Activity Execution?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">An Activity Execution is the full chain of Activity Task Executions.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> to fail.

Alias: `-w`

**Example**

```bash
tctl activity fail --workflow_id <id>
```

### --run_id

Specify the [Run Id](/workflows#run-id) <span id="i-6d327ae8-1b05-4d39-8b4e-9ba0085f0033" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-6d327ae8-1b05-4d39-8b4e-9ba0085f0033" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-6d327ae8-1b05-4d39-8b4e-9ba0085f0033" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Run Id?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A Run Id is a globally unique, platform-level identifier for a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> of an [Activity Execution](/activities#activity-execution) <span id="i-148fa288-0625-4965-a67d-4b4288b9dafd" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-148fa288-0625-4965-a67d-4b4288b9dafd" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-148fa288-0625-4965-a67d-4b4288b9dafd" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is an Activity Execution?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">An Activity Execution is the full chain of Activity Task Executions.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> to fail.

Alias: `-r`

**Example**

```bash
tctl activity fail --run_id <id>
```

### --activity_id

Specify the [Activity Id](/activities#activity-id) <span id="i-23e1dd1d-1cf6-47d9-823e-9d6774902d99" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-23e1dd1d-1cf6-47d9-823e-9d6774902d99" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-23e1dd1d-1cf6-47d9-823e-9d6774902d99" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is an Activity Id?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">A unique identifier for an Activity Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> of an [Activity Execution](/activities#activity-execution) <span id="i-e419304c-c6b6-4ff4-9321-ce6d67ee8bfd" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-e419304c-c6b6-4ff4-9321-ce6d67ee8bfd" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-e419304c-c6b6-4ff4-9321-ce6d67ee8bfd" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is an Activity Execution?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">An Activity Execution is the full chain of Activity Task Executions.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div> to fail.

**Example**

```bash
tctl activity fail --activity_id <id>
```

### --reason

Specify the reason for failing an [Activity Execution](/activities#activity-execution) <span id="i-d7dc1647-8d93-48ba-bf81-72cc49156c18" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-d7dc1647-8d93-48ba-bf81-72cc49156c18" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-d7dc1647-8d93-48ba-bf81-72cc49156c18" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is an Activity Execution?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">An Activity Execution is the full chain of Activity Task Executions.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div>.

**Example**

```bash
tctl activity fail --reason <value>
```

### --detail

Specify details of the reason for failing an [Activity Execution](/activities#activity-execution) <span id="i-fb256874-8298-4439-9e86-d230d22a07d8" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-fb256874-8298-4439-9e86-d230d22a07d8" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-fb256874-8298-4439-9e86-d230d22a07d8" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is an Activity Execution?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">An Activity Execution is the full chain of Activity Task Executions.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div>.

**Example**

```bash
tctl activity fail --detail <value>
```

### --identity

Specify the identity of the operator when using tctl to fail an [Activity Execution](/activities#activity-execution) <span id="i-b61a1bd2-9c79-4e07-8d42-1db22fad1294" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-b61a1bd2-9c79-4e07-8d42-1db22fad1294" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-b61a1bd2-9c79-4e07-8d42-1db22fad1294" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is an Activity Execution?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">An Activity Execution is the full chain of Activity Task Executions.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div>.

**Example**

```bash
tctl activity complete --identity <value>
```
